palec 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

palec

Tools for Palaeoecological Analysis

This package replicates and enhances some of the functions previously available in PAST v2, some of which are now discontinued.

The tools are intended to provide a straightforward and easy-to-use approach to palaeoecosystem analysis, providing context for some widely-used metrics to allow rigorous interpretation.

An introduction to its use, with full installation instructions, is available as part of my GEOL2031 teaching materials.

Installing

The pre-release version of the package can be pulled from GitHub using the ‘devtools’ package:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("smithlabdurham/palec")
